rows.label: qst104207_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, hey! Are you guys helping
out with the school too?

rows.label: qst104207_msg0002
rows.name:
Yay! Let's make it the best school
in all of Alst!

rows.label: qst104207_msg0101
rows.name:
I'm doing the decorating!
I need fabrics, musical instruments,
artwork and books, that kind of stuff!

rows.label: qst104207_msg0102
rows.name:
Did you bring anything I could
use to decorate?

rows.label: qst104207_msg0121
rows.name:
I'm gonna keep adding decorations
until the whole school looks beautiful!
So keep bringing me stuff,okay?

rows.label: qst104207_msg0141
rows.name:
I think that should do it!
Thanks!

rows.label: qst104207_msg0161
rows.name:
Ooh, which decoration should I use
where? This is so much fun!

rows.label: qst104207_msg0201
rows.name:
Making a school is hard. But it's fun!
More fun than going to school, actually.
